main.name: Muffakham Ali Farhan
main.description: at the Arizona State University, currently pursuing my master's in computer Science
main.bio: A Grad Sudent at the Arizona State University currently pursuing my Master's in computer Science, I am a passionate developer and a machine learning enthusiast. I love to develop web and mobile applications and I am quite interested in application oreinted machine learning.
main.contactmessage: I am curently looking for co-op oppurtunities for the semester of spring 2021

resume.skillmessage: Some of my skills which I learnt over the course of time

education.description: Currently I am studying at ASU and would graduate in the fall of 2021. My major focus is on Machine Learning. So far inn my MS, I have taken courses such as the Statistical Machine Learning, Data Mining, Data Intensive Systems for Machine Learning and Data Processing at Scale.

The four years of my undegrad have been exceptional. I have learnt a lot both on the personal and professional front. I developed a many skills during my undegrad and one of those major skills was mobile and web application development. I am in awe at the concept of creating something worthwhile for people to use and love how the web and mobile apps empower this idea. I still learn a lot about application development every single day and enjoy every learning curve!

work.title: Web application developer Intern
work.description: Worked  towards the development of web applications using the javascript frameworks of react.js and redux.js. During my time at itversity, I was primarily involved in the creation of front end styling components for the web applications and focused mainly on the front end design and creation for a food delivery web application.

work.title: Andorid application developer Intern
work.description: Worked as an android app developer. During my internship I built an android based application for the firm. Its aim was to have an efficient workflow management system for its employees so that the employees could keep their team lead posted about their daily accomplishments of the assigned tasks. I was also involved with the requirements, gathering and designing of specifications for the application. The application was developed in java with the help of android studio. Firebase analytics and its real time database was also implied for the application

projects.title: Image Recommender System
projects.category: An Image based product recommendation system implemented using statistical machine learning algorithms

projects.title: Hot Spot Analysis
projects.category: A spark project implementation to obtain the taxi hot spots in New York City

projects.title: Machine Learning Algortihms
projects.category: Implementation of basic machine learning algorithms like Kmeans, KNN and etc.

projects.title: Gesture Tutor
projects.category: A simple android application to learn the American Sign Language (ASL) gestures and upload the user's practice videos to a Server

projects.title: ASL Fingerspell
projects.category: A system that takes in the Sign Language fingerspelling of the words provided by the user and predicts the word from the video

testimonials.text: If money is your hope for independence you will never have it. The only real security that a man will have in this world is a reserve of knowledge, experience, and ability.

Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
